frontmatter.heading: 先进的IT技术 为机器人工程师们提供更为便捷的开发操作平台
frontmatter.description: 机器人工程师常常被称作是工程师中的超级工程师。一位优秀的机器人工程师，在机器人开发中的每一个环节都需要亲历亲行。机器人工程师的工作内容涉及的范围广，工作量大。这些已经成为了机器人工程师在进行开发工作时的阻力。为此，我们研发了RDBOX（A Robotics Developers BOX）。它可以为机器人工程师提供更为便捷的机器人开发操作平台。

blurbs.text: RDBOX与其他的机器人开发操作平台存在着不同之处，比如可以直接使用已有的ROS机器人操作系统的调试工具。rivz，rostopic，rqt等调试命令也可以正常使用。通过使用Kubernetes，滚动更新以及回滚的自动分配，自动运用功能的应用也成为可能。机器人可以作为服务器群进行使用的RDBOX，适用于数十台甚至数百台的机器人的群操控。RDBOX让至今为止，一些复杂、繁琐的机器人开发工作变得更加容易。
高度安全的机器人专用局域网络可以简单的构建。ROS-Wiki推荐使用的VPN, NAT/防火墙等安全措施，也适用于RDBOX。安装了RDBOX的边缘节点充当接入点的RaspberryPi3后，只需要连接无线Wi-Fi或者有线LAN网络便可以使用。在这个操作过程中，即使对通信、互联网的专业知识并不熟知的人，也可以成功的完成机器人专用的局域网络和开发环境的构建。
RDBOX支持机器人可持续开发、应用的CI(Continuous Integration)持续集成工具的导入。CI持续集成工具的导入，可以减轻机器人工程师在进行正式开发工作时的压力。IT世界里被广泛使用的CI持续集成工具，在使用RDBOX进行机器人开发时都可以适用。针对机器人的状态，可以实现实时滚动更新以及回滚等高度的自动部署功能。

Many network applications, including NTP, are offered with the product. Automate your network robot management. Take NTP as an example. Many company networks limit connections to public NTP servers, but RDBOX makes clock synchronization between all computers easy. Other standard network services such as DNS, DHCP, and NFS are also provided. It enables communication by host name and contributes to high extensibility in coordination with Kubernetes. In addition, we provide transparent proxies for certified proxy environments that significantly reduce the productivity of Linux developers. There is no need to be aware of the presence of proxies under Wi-Fi or wired LAN networks provided by RaspberryPi3 with RDBOX edge node installed.

Take advantage of virtualization to reduce stress. RDBOX makes it easy to build Kubernetes clusters that can mix CPU architectures. Robots are often equipped with ARM architecture CPUs in terms of power efficiency. RDBOX is not aware of the mixture with the common x86 architecture in cloud computing. No matter how many robots there are, you can control from one place. (Kubernetes Dashboard and command of kubectl.) Configure the Kubernetes cluster with all the computer resources on which the robot app runs. Start and monitor nodes and processes, and standard output from them can be handled centrally from the RDBOX.

Container virtualization frees engineers from repeated setup of the OS and middleware. Save "Docker container image" with OS and middleware already set up in the registry. At the time of robot application development, by implementing only difference based on this container image, repetitive work is suppressed.
